mapper.select: SELECT gameNo, gameName, gameImage, gamePrice, gameContent, gameContent, gameGenre, '('||to_char(gameReleasedDate,'yyyy')||')' FROM game ORDER BY gameReleaseDate DESC

SELECT game.gameNo, game.gameName, game.gameImage, game.gamePrice, game.gameContent, game.gameContent, game.gameGenre, '('||to_char(game.gameReleasedDate,'yyyy')||')' FROM game, rate WHERE game.gameNo = rate.gameNo ORDER BY rate.gameScore DESC, game.gameReleasedDate DESC

SELECT game.gameNo, game.gameName, game.gameImage, game.gamePrice, game.gameContent, game.gameContent, game.gameGenre, '('||to_char(game.gameReleasedDate,'yyyy')||')' FROM game, rate WHERE game.gameNo = rate.gameNo AND REGEXP_LIKE (game.gameGenre, (SELECT NVL(REPLACE(mbrGenre, ',', '|'), '*') FROM member WHERE mbrId = #{mbrId} )) ORDER BY rate.gameScore DESC, game.gameReleasedDate DESC
